author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
It's finally here: Steam Frame is Valve's new virtual reality headset, and we spend a day at Valve going hands-on with the new hardware, alongside the newly announced Steam Machine and Steam Controller! Here's everything you need to know about this standalone headset, how it plays both VR and flatscreen games, and Valve's unique approach to streaming PCVR games from a desktop. Let's dive deep into the hardware!

Shot by Joey Fameli and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

title: Valve Steam Frame Virtual Reality Headset Hands-On!
